title: Contemporary 'Kadaa' Bangles with Sparkling CZ Stones
materials: 22K Gold Plated Alloy base. High-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features a Hyderabadi polish for added luster and durability.
features: Modern tennis bracelet style design, transformed into traditional Kadaa Bangles. Each CZ stone is individually prong-set, ensuring maximum brilliance and security. The simple yet elegant construction makes them perfect for stacking or wearing alone.
colors: Warm gold tone complemented by the icy sparkle of clear CZ stones
a timeless and versatile color combination.
occasions: and as a modern twist on traditional celebrations. A stylish addition to any outfit
from sarees and salwar suits to western wear.
description: These bangles offer a contemporary take on classic Indian jewelry. The high-quality CZ stones provide a brilliant sparkle without the price tag of diamonds. The durable 22K gold plated finish and secure stone setting ensure longevity. A versatile piece that blends tradition with modern aesthetics. Locally polished with Hyderabadi technique.
